Help:Node.title: Help for New Players
Help:Node.Log:Description:
GENERAL CONCEPTS: Help for New Players
Looking at things:
$(udat.chatchar)LOOK - looks at everything in the same place as you
$(udat.chatchar)EXAMINE - a look with more detail
$(udat.chatchar)LOOK [OBJECT] - looks at the object
$(udat.chatchar)EXAMINE [OBJECT] - a more detailed look at the object
Movement:
$(udat.chatchar)GO [DIRECTION] - go direction
$(udat.chatchar)N $(udat.chatchar)S $(udat.chatchar)E $(udat.chatchar)W $(udat.chatchar)NE $(udat.chatchar)NW $(udat.chatchar)SE $(udat.chatchar)SW $(udat.chatchar)U $(udat.chatchar)D - go a direction
($(udat.chatchar)NORTH, $(udat.chatchar)UP, $(udat.chatchar)SOUTHEAST, etc. also work)
$(udat.chatchar)GO [OBJECT] - go direction through the object
$(udat.chatchar)ENTER [PORTAL] - enter through the portal
Yourself:
$(udat.chatchar)INVENTORY or $(udat.chatchar)I
Getting Assistance:
$(udat.chatchar)@TIP - gives you a tip for new players
$(udat.chatchar)HELP GENERAL - gives list of general concepts
$(udat.chatchar)HELP COMMAND - gives help on a specific command
$(udat.chatchar)ASSIST "[MESSAGE]" - requests an available storyhost
